title: Wireless Energy Transmission - 1899
restored: ⚡ EXPERIMENT LOG - COLORADO SPRINGS ⚡ Tonight I transmitted electrical energy without wires across a distance of 26 miles. The earth itself became my conductor. Imagine: a world where power flows freely through the air, no cables, no limitations. Edison's direct current is primitive by comparison. The future belongs to alternating current and wireless transmission. Mark my words - humanity will one day harness the ionosphere itself.

title: Wardenclyffe Tower Vision
restored: ⚡ WARDENCLYFFE TOWER PROJECT ⚡ My greatest work remains unfinished. J.P. Morgan pulled funding when he realized I intended to provide free energy to the world. 'Where do we put the meter?' he asked. They cannot monetize the ionosphere, so they killed the project. The tower stands incomplete, a monument to humanity's fear of true progress. But the science is sound. One day, someone will finish what I started.

title: Death Ray Concept - 1934
restored: ⚡ TELEFORCE WEAPON SYSTEM ⚡ They call it a 'death ray' but it is so much more. A focused particle beam weapon capable of bringing down aircraft at 250 miles. I offered it to the U.S. War Department - they dismissed me as a madman. The Soviets showed interest, but I will not see my inventions used for conquest. This technology could end all wars by making them impossible. Or it could end civilization. The choice, as always, belongs to those who come after me.
